column1: prompt_piece
alien princess with glimmering bodysuit
badge-insignia across chestplate glinting under lights
bare torso draped in silk sheets
candlelit curves with soft-focus glow, sensual
cracks in her visor and ambient sparks
crouched on gravestone in shredded black lace
delicate hands trailing along thigh
dripping data shards melting off form
electric glitch veins pulsating under skin
erotic dancer in lace lingerie and garter belts
faint scanlines over her face
fingerless gloves gripping a joystick
floating glitch drones orbiting her head
fractaled portal beacon in background
fractured RGB halos flickering overhead
ghostly pixel silhouettes emerging from shadows
holographic glitch butterflies fluttering around
interstellar engineer with toolbelt and bruises
kneeling in rain-soaked cyber alley, neon pulsing on her skin
lace corset and fishnet stockings, high heels
lace gloves and silver rings catching the light
latex tactical uniform with helmet off
levitating shards of corrupted glass
lipstick smear and chipped nail polish
lounging in vintage lingerie, sipping dark wine
neon code rain cascading off her shoulders
neon tattoos glowing on her back under blacklight
power cables wrapping around her boots
red hologram projected over her exposed midriff
reflection of fire or explosions across glass screens
robotic hand gently brushing her hair aside
runic circuit tattoos glowing on her flesh
satanic symbols and demonic iconography
seated calmly, adjusting a visor interface
sensual pose contrasting with grim surroundings
sensual sheen of wet skin with droplets glistening
shattered mirror fragments raining down
silhouette teasingly backlit, full nudity implied
smoke rings made of binary bits
space cowgirl with holographic revolver
spinning beneath a red HUD projection in sheer bodysuit
tentacle-like cables wrapped sensually around her legs
tight minimal uniform with glowing accents
whisper of fetish harness straps and leather
